title: Anyone have a Pantone Metallic swatch book?
content:
I'm getting this card design letterpressed and we're trying to see if we've got a close enough Pantone match for imprinting the yellow on a charcoal gray stock, since it's a dark stock metallic inks work best. Anyone know if there's a decently close match? Doesn't have to be the exact shade, just a bright yellow in a similar hue. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020080307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clint_card_6477.jpg)
author: cfig
